testcase.name: Verify cancel checkout action
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cancel checkout action Given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 5.015s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.069s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.184s And User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.183s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.209s And User clicks on continue button ... passed in 1.198s Then Verify user should be navigated to the checkout page ... passed in 0.007s When User clicks cancel on checkout overview page ... passed in 1.193s Then Verify user navigates to the cart page ... passed in 0.008s And Verify cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.005s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify error on empty checkout fields
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify error on empty checkout fields Given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 5.043s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.063s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.218s And User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.202s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.193s And User clicks on continue button ... passed in 1.215s Then Verify user should be navigated to the checkout page ... passed in 0.006s When User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Problem', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.252s Then User clicks continue from checkout overview page ... passed in 1.200s And Verify 'Error: Last Name is required' should be displayed ... passed in 0.012s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
